mapper.select: select bt.board_id, ut.username, bt.title, bt.hide from board_tb as bt left outer join board_user_tb as ut on bt.user_id = ut.user_id
select bt.board_id, ut.username, bt.title, bt.hide from board_tb as bt left outer join board_user_tb as ut on bt.user_id = ut.user_id where bt.board_id = #{boardId}

select username, (select count(*) from board_tb as bt where ut.user_id = bt.user_id) as board, (select count(*) from comment_tb as ct where ut.user_id = ct.user_id) + (select count(*) from child_comment_tb as cct where ut.user_id = cct.user_id) as comment from board_user_tb as ut group by username order by board desc

select username, (select count(*) from board_tb as bt where ut.user_id = bt.user_id) as board, (select count(*) from comment_tb as ct where ut.user_id = ct.user_id) + (select count(*) from child_comment_tb as cct where ut.user_id = cct.user_id) as comment from board_user_tb as ut group by username order by comment desc
mapper.update: update board_authority_tb set authority = "BLACK" where board_authority_tb.user_id = (select user_id from board_tb where board_id = #{boardId})
